News.headline: Support the Daggers Fund 250 Club
News.short_description: The "Support the Daggers Fund" 250 club will be running again in 2017 over the next 12 months
News.description:
The “Support the Daggers Fund” 250 Club will again be running over the coming 12 months where supporters are again asked to pledge £5.00 per month with the chance of winning monthly prizes of £100.00, £50.00 & £25.00 plus entry into the 2017 Christmas prize, again for £1,000.00, £500.00 & £250.00.

With just 250 members there is a great opportunity to win a prize but with the added bonus of raising over £11,000 per year towards funding our Academy.

In August last year the Support the Daggers Fund donated £20,000 to assist the Daggers Academy and this money is chiefly raised via the 250 Club and the matchday 50/50 draw so your support is greatly appreciated.

The Monthly draw is made on the last home game of every month or during the closed season on the last Sunday of each month.
The Grand Annual draw takes place on the nearest home game to Christmas.
All prize winners are notified by post and a list of prize winners is published on the Club’s official web site and in the matchday programme.

Hopefully existing members will continue their support and will automatically be renewed when subscribing in the same way as they have before.
There is however a number of vacancies and new members are welcomed.

Supporters can either pay £5 monthly or £60 annually by way of cheque or monthly standing order.
All cheques to be made payable to THE SUPPORT THE DAGGERS FUND.
Each participant will be allocated a number for the season and members may hold more than one share.
Participants must be 16 or over.
For an application form to become a new member please ask in the Club House or download HERE.

Good luck to all those in Saturday’s draw and thank you to everyone who have contributed over the past 12 months.
